story_title: national ice cream day intresting history fact
original_story: [excited] Here’s a scoop – National Ice Cream Day was declared by President Reagan in 1984! How wild is that? To celebrate this sweet treat, he proclaimed July's third Sunday as a day to enjoy ice cream. Turns out, he was a huge fan, even naming it a ‘nutritional benefit’! With over 90% of Americans indulging in ice cream, it’s a national favorite. And get this: ice cream sales soar on this day! So, what’s your favorite flavor? Enjoying any today?
